params._communityId: Community identifier for this engagements contract instance
params._membershipToken: MembershipToken contract address for minting rewards

params.engagementId: Engagement ID to get info for

returns._0: Array of engagement IDs for participant

updateContracts(address,address).details: actionRegistry and communityId are immutable and cannot be updated

params.approve: True to approve, false to reject

assignJurors(uint256,address[]).notice: Assign jurors to an engagement (called by VerifierManager)

getCommunityId().notice: Get the community ID for this engagements contract

getEngagementJurors(uint256).notice: Get jurors assigned to an engagement

getPendingEngagements(uint256).notice: Get pending engagements for action type

hasJurorVoted(uint256,address).notice: Check if juror has voted on engagement

revoke(uint256).notice: Revoke engagement (governance only, for revocable action types)

submit(uint256,string).notice: Submit a one-shot engagement for verification

verify(uint256,bool).notice: Submit verification vote as assigned juror
